name: 2.B - The Wheel (Final)
description:
This is a HTML and CSS based text game that focuses on circularity, cyclicality, and rebirth.  I wanted to present the player with a series of similar "landscapes" of color with small differences for them to notice. Eventually, if the player can make their way out of the cycle they will be presented with a smaller narrative.  Overall, I enjoyed experimenting with loops and different creative coding solutions!

This piece was inspired by the work of Hellen Pandey, my friend!
